thread.title: Uhm Tae Woong Returns To Acting Following Solicitation Controversy
thread.title_full: Uhm Tae Woong Returns To Acting Following Solicitation Controversy

author: kokoberry
title: Uhm Tae Woong Returns To Acting Following Solicitation Controversy
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On February 25, KeyEast confirmed Uhm Tae Woong ’s return to acting. 
A source from his agency said, “Uhm Tae Woong is appearing in Director Lee Joo Hyung’s movie ‘Fork Crane.'” 
The source answered questions about when the movie will be released in theatres and replied, “We don’t know yet. Since they just started filming, the production company and others will focus on filming for now.” 
Previously, Uhm Tae Woong was accused of sexual assault but eventually found to be guilty of solicitation . The actor’s last project was SBS’s “ Wanted .”
